name: Secret (Ando_Fellak)
description: The game is a story type based on my first game I've ever made, which makes this my second. It's basically a remake with some changes... The game is really short, I would say like 5 minutes, so keep in mind it's not a big deal. Anyway, enjoy the game and I really appreciate you playing it. By the way there may be some links like discord, Instagram and so on... (They are not working) Let's say they're there just for effect.
